name: PM-KISAN (Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi)
description: Income support scheme providing ₹6000 per year to small and marginal farmers
eligibility: Land holding should be less than 2 hectares
Should not be an income tax payer
Should not be a government employee or pensioner
benefits: ₹6000 per year in 3 equal installments of ₹2000 each, directly transferred to bank account
documents_required: Bank account details (account number, IFSC code)
how_to_apply: Fill the application form with Aadhaar details
Submit land records and bank account proof

name: EPF (Employee Provident Fund)
description: Mandatory retirement savings scheme for salaried employees earning less than ₹15,000/month
eligibility: Working in an establishment with 20 or more employees
Earning basic salary + DA less than ₹15,000 per month (mandatory)
benefits: 12% of basic salary contributed by employee + 12% by employer. Interest earned on accumulated amount. Withdrawal allowed at retirement, resignation, or specific needs
how_to_apply: Employer registers employee automatically on joining
Employee provides Aadhaar and PAN to employer
Link Aadhaar with UAN on epfindia.gov.in

name: ESI (Employee State Insurance)
description: Health insurance and cash benefits scheme for workers earning up to ₹21,000/month
eligibility: Working in a factory/establishment with 10+ employees
benefits: Free medical care for self and family (spouse, children, parents). Cash benefits during sickness, maternity, disability. Pension in case of death or permanent disability
how_to_apply: Visit any ESI hospital/dispensary for treatment
Show ESI card for free medical services

name: Ayushman Bharat (PM-JAY)
description: Free health insurance up to ₹5 lakh per family per year for poor and vulnerable families
eligibility: Families listed in SECC-2011 (Socio-Economic Caste Census)
No income limit - based on deprivation criteria
benefits: Free hospitalization up to ₹5 lakh per family per year. Covers secondary and tertiary care. Cashless and paperless in empanelled hospitals
how_to_apply: Check eligibility at pmjay.gov.in or toll-free 14555
If eligible, visit nearest Common Service Center
Show card at any empanelled hospital

name: MGNREGA (Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act)
description: Guarantees 100 days of wage employment per year to rural households for unskilled manual work
eligibility: Willing to do unskilled manual work
benefits: Minimum 100 days of guaranteed employment per household per year. Wages paid as per state rates (₹200-300 per day). Work within 5km of residence
how_to_apply: Fill application form for job card
